attributes.description: Lets go places! And you can with our 2018 Toyota RAV4. Literally anywhere!! She is presented with an impressive list of features – key-less start, front and rear park distance control, alloy wheels, reverse camera, automatic xenon headlights, front and rear fog lights, climate control, leather interior, radio/CD, electric windows, electric mirrors, on board computer, airbags and power steering to make this 4×4 vehicle Simply stunning and its priced right, just for you!. If you are interested she also comes with Full Service History and an AA Multipoint Check, so send us an inquiry and we will get you on the road asap!. All our vehicles are sold with a comprehensive Dekra AA roadworthy certificate for peace of mind driving. FINANCE THROUGH ALL LEADING BANKS , NO DEPOSIT NEEDED , TRADE INS WELCOME.
